{{Infobox dungeon |name = Sprout Tower |image = [[File:Sprout Tower.png]] |caption = An outside view of Sprout Tower. |tokens = 2,500 |location = Directly east of Violet City }} '''Sprout Tower''' is a dungeon in [[Johto]].
==Details==
===Dungeon Stats===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Pokémon !! Base Health |- | Normal || 56,735 |- | Boss || 240,000 |}
===Pokémon===
* Ratatta * Gastly * Hoothoot * Bellsprout (boss)
===Items===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !! Chance to Find |- | [[X Attack|xAttack]] || 50% |- | [[XClick|xClick]] || 25% |- | [[Item Magnet]] || 25% |}
